title: MovieHunt
description: A responsive movie database app built with React that fetches real-time data from TMDB API. Features include top-rated, popular, upcoming movies, detailed views, IMDb redirection, and search functionality.

title: Travel Site
description: Developed a responsive travel booking platform featuring hotel listings, detailed views, booking with payment and invoice download, plus integrated trending news via API.

title: User Management
description: A secure and responsive user management app using React that fetches data from an API. Users must log in to view, edit, or delete user profiles.

title: Shop Cart
description: A responsive React-based e-commerce app where users can browse products from an API, add them to a cart, and complete the checkout. Features dynamic UI updates and smooth state handling with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Notes App
description: A responsive note-taking app that allows users to create, edit, delete, and search notes. Deleted notes persist in local storage, maintaining state across page refreshes.

title: Weather App
description: Shows real-time weather updates by fetching data from OpenWeatherMap API. Displays temperature, humidity, wind speed, and city-specific info with themed icons.
